name: Mecomni
short_description:
Mecomni is a simple program that logins to your Omnivox account, downloads all the distributed documents, and organizes them into folders.
Version 1.3 - only supports Windows and Marianopolis College 

Step-by-step installation of Mecomni

1)	Download the zip file
2)	Extract the folder in zip file
3)	Open the extracted folder
4)	Double-click on Mecomni 1.3

More details on the code go to:
https://github.com/cgwelcome/Mecomni.git
